TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TokenCacheCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TokenCacheCallback(args As TokenCacheNotificationArgs)
type TokenCacheCallback = delegate of TokenCacheNotificationArgs -> unit

Docs.param: Arguments related to the cache item impacted
Docs.summary: Notification for certain token cache interactions during token acquisition. This delegate is used in particular to provide a custom token cache serialization
